name: Space Conquest (itch) (Main [Alice])
description:
Take a look at this modern take on space invaders where aliens and asteroids appear tottaly random so you don't play the same game twice!

Challenge your friends to beat your highscore on this game where highscores not only depend on how well you play, but on how well you manage your credits!
Save your credtis for extra lifes so you can continue and beat your friend's highest score!
